PHRASE.LANG: Amazing! You completed all 12 puzzles in Cogs. To commemorate your accomplishment, here is a piece of stylish steampunk art for your apartment. [#Legal]
Fantastique ! Vous avez terminé les 12 casse-têtes de Cogs HOME. Pour célébrer cela, voici un élégant objet d'art de steampunk pour votre appartement. [#Legal]
Erstaunlich! Du hast alle 12 Cogs-Puzzles gelöst. Um deinen Erfolg zu belohnen, erhältst du hiermit für dein Appartment ein stilvolles im Steampunk-Stil gehaltenes Kunstwerk. [#Legal]
Fantastico! Hai completato tutti e 12 gli schemi di Cogs Home. Per celebrare questo evento ti regaliamo un’opera d’arte steampunk di gran stile, per il tuo appartamento. [#Legal]
¡Fantástico! Has completado los 12 rompecabezas en Cogs. Para celebrar este logro, aquí tienes una elegante pieza de arte retrofuturista para tu apartamento. [#Legal]
놀랍군요! 12개의 모든 코그 퍼즐을 완성했습니다! 당신의 실력을 기념하기 위하여 멋진 스팀펑크 장식물을 증정합니다. 아파트를 장식하세요! [#Legal]
Amazing! You completed all 12 puzzles in Cogs. To commemorate your accomplishment, here is a piece of stylish steampunk art for your apartment. [#Legal]
太厲害了！您完成了「齒輪王」遊戲的所有12道關卡。為了紀念您的豐功偉業，我們特別獻上這個以蒸汽機為主題的壁飾，供您裝飾個人空間。[#Legal]
太厲害了！您完成了「齒輪王」遊戲的所有12道關卡。為了紀念您的豐功偉業，我們特別獻上這個以蒸汽機為主題的壁飾，供您裝飾個人空間。[#Legal]
Amazing! You completed all 12 puzzles in Cogs. To commemorate your accomplishment, here is a piece of stylish steampunk art for your apartment. [#Legal]
